Field.Label: Preset Memories:
Enter how many Preset memories you'd like Hue Lights to keep saved (a number from 1 to 100). See warning below.

WARNING: Lowering the Preset Memories number will cause the highest Preset memory spaces to be permanently deleted. All actions that reference deleted Presets will result in Indigo errors when attempting to recall those Presets. Don't lower the number unless you're sure nothing uses the Presets that will be deleted.

Enter the IP address assigned to the Hue Bridge by your router. If you are unable to find the IP address given to your Hue Bridge using your router's administrative interface, you can obtain the Hue Bridge's IP address by registering on and using the www.meethue.com web site, then viewing your Bridge settings.
After the IP address has been entered, go to the Hue Bridge and press the center button. Within 30 seconds, come back to this dialog and click the "Pair Now" button.
Once this is done, click the "Save" button.
